mapper.select: select a.name,count(b.id) as value from b_category a left join b_article b on a.id=b.category_id GROUP BY a.id

select a.id,a.name,a.sort,a.create_time,a.click_volume,b.articleCount from b_category a left join (select category_id,count(id) as articleCount from b_article group by category_id) b on a.id=b.category_id
a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select c.id,c.name,count(b.id) as articleNum from b_category c left join b_article b on c.id=b.category_id group by c.id order by c.sort desc

select c.id,c.name,count(b.id) as articleNum, o.icon, o.is_book from b_category c left join b_article b on c.id=b.category_id left join b_category_book o ON c.id = o.category_id WHERE o.is_book = 1 group by c.id order by c.sort desc
select count(b.category_id) from b_category_book b where b.category_id = #{categoryId}
